tooltip.vaultcoinpouch.info:
Stores unlimited amounts of coins.
Coins picked up will go directly into the pouch.
Also converts coins up and down like a compacting drawer.
tooltip.vaultcoinpouch.soulbound: Combine with Echo Pog in an Anvil to add Soulbound.
configs.vaultcoinpouch.title: Coin Pouch Configs
configs.vaultcoinpouch.soulbound.name: Enable Soulbound
configs.vaultcoinpouch.soulbound.tooltip:
Enable / Disable the possibility
to add Soulbound to the pouch.
configs.vaultcoinpouch.shopPedestalInter:
Enable / Disable interaction with Shop Pedestal
 without taking coins out of the pouch.
configs.vaultcoinpouch.vaultForgeInterac:
Enable / Disable interaction with Vault Forge
 without taking coins out of the pouch.
configs.vaultcoinpouch.toolStationIntera:
Enable / Disable interaction with Tool Station
 without taking coins out of the pouch.
configs.vaultcoinpouch.inscriptionTableI:
Enable / Disable interaction with Inscription Table
 without taking coins out of the pouch.
configs.vaultcoinpouch.modifierWorkbench:
Enable / Disable interaction with Modifier Workbench
 without taking coins out of the pouch.
configs.vaultcoinpouch.alchemyTableInter:
Enable / Disable interaction with Alchemy Table
 without taking coins out of the pouch.
configs.vaultcoinpouch.transmogTableInte:
Enable / Disable interaction with Transmog Table
 without taking coins out of the pouch.
configs.vaultcoinpouch.vaultArtisanStati:
Enable / Disable interaction with Vault Artisan Station
 without taking coins out of the pouch.
configs.vaultcoinpouch.jewelCuttingStati:
Enable / Disable interaction with Jewel Cutting Station
 without taking coins out of the pouch.
configs.vaultcoinpouch.spiritExtractorIn:
Enable / Disable interaction with Spirit Extractor
 without taking coins out of the pouch.
